marytts.tools.voiceimport

Class PauseFeatureComputer

  • java.lang.Object
    • marytts.tools.voiceimport.VoiceImportComponent
      • marytts.tools.voiceimport.PauseFeatureComputer

  • public class PauseFeatureComputer
extends VoiceImportComponent
    For the given texts, compute unit features and align them with the given unit labels.
    Author:
    schroed
